title: Do you know when the will was damaged or marked?
question: Do you know when the will was damaged or marked?
date: Date the will was damaged or marked
dateHint:
Date the will was damaged or marked

If you don’t know the exact date, enter the year

willDamageDateKnown.required: Select ‘yes’ if you know when the will was damaged or marked

willdamagedate-year.required: Date the will was damaged or marked must include the year

willdamagedate-month.required: Please enter the month if you know the day it was damaged

willdamagedate.future: Date the will was damaged or marked must be today or in the past
willdamagedate.invalid: Date the will was damaged or marked must be a real date
